extendedInfo.description: Take to the skies with Fly !, the first  release by Exano Software!Fly your aircraft through the skies dodging obstacles as you try and get to the city in this retro themed world. Collect money and rewards as you fly to improve your aircraft and beat career mode, or see how long you can make your flight last in endless mode!  Fly features hours of addicting casual gameplay as you fly your aircraft across a retro inspired theme, this upgrade game is sure to keep you hooked for hours!  Fly was inspired as a take on retro SNES gaming. Featuring a throwback world to the 16-bit era, Fly!'s SNES inspired world puts a modern twist to retro games. What are you waiting for? It's your time to Fly ! So sit back and enjoy your flight.

reviews.title: Good game, has some bugs
reviews.comment: I\'ve played about 2 hours of this game and it\'s pretty fun. I have a few suggestions though.   1. Add gas to the map. I very rarely lose to anything other than running out of gas. I understand the importance of buying upgrades but I don\'t like that it\'s impossible to get further unless you upgrade  2. Decrease the hit box for birds. I can\'t count the number of times I\'ve clearly missed the bird but it still counts as a hit.   Bugs:  1. When I lock my phone mid game and the unlock the app crashes.
reviews.author: Jeff Ewing

reviews.title: Promising, with a little polish!
reviews.comment: This takes a slight twist on the classic \"Upgrade\" genre, giving the player more control up front.  The mechanics need some tweaking, and the interface could use a bit more attention, but the core of the game is all kinds of fun!
reviews.author: Casey Grimm
